0ADD8CC1.Phase40OutsideSubzoneHeader: Bring Elias' Mummified Finger to Lorath in Rotspill Delta

1EF99359.Phase40Description: Removing Elias' finger from the altar caused the temple to sink further into the murky waters. I was able to escape, but only barely.

44ADC39F.Phase46Description: The fire has roused Neyrelle. I should check on her.

9AC58840.BreadcrumbHeader: Speak with Lorath in Rotspill Delta

B1D3AB7C.Phase43Description: I found Lorath tending to Neyrelle. Luckily it appears as though she will survive. I explained what I found in the sunken temple. It's time to burn Elias' finger and break his immortality.

F12B6BC7.Phase46OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Neyrelle in Rotspill Delta
